EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Gartner_Q215.Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at Gartner BI & Analytics Summit!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Thanks for visiting Pivotal at the Gartner Business Intelligence & Analytics Summit in Las Vegas.
If you missed the Pivotal session at the event, check out this recording of Transforming into a Data-Driven Enterprise Using Existing Skill Sets <http://gartner.mediasite.com/Mediasite/Play/030b4f60833b41f580187b8e348f091b1d>, which outlines the ways that companies of all sizes are leveraging a single platform that combines flexible data storage systems, advanced analytics and agile app-dev PaaS frameworks, all available now in open source forums.
Want more? Come see Pivotal in action at a Pivotal Big Data Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow> or Pivotal Cloud Roadshow <http://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow> near you.
We look forward to seeing you at the next event <http://pivotal.io/news-events>!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
